content: Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: All stream members can post.
  • New permissions: Only organization administrators and moderators can post.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

No description.

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #learning: reading & references instead.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream learning: statistics reading group to deprecated: statistics reading group.
